QuestData.Title: Meet with Dalgrun Steelpine
QuestData.Description: Dalgrun Steelpine sends word from Stormwind -- he wants to meet with you right away. He'll be waiting for you in the Training Hall in Stormwind's Old Town district.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Dalgrun Steelpine at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Dalgrun Steelpine at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
